data.actual_result: The server jumps back to it's original position after letting go
data.expected_result: The placeholder stays and you can drop the server at a place where you want it
data.short_description: Dragging a server down doesn't work when there is 1 outage
data.steps_to_repro: - Have so many servers that you are able to scroll down - Grab a server from the top - Try to move past the original place of the server that is out and put it down the list- The list will scroll - See that the placeholder goes away after you get to the bottom of the list - Let it go at a place where you want it - See that the server jumps back to it's original position
